home.subtitle: Introduction
home.description: Web developer passionate about creating incredible experiences, with skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React, always seeking improvement and innovation.

aboutMe.subtitle: About me
aboutMe.title: Who am I?
aboutMe.paragraph-top: I'm a 16-year-old front-end developer focused on creating modern and responsive interfaces. I work on my own projects and freelance projects, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, as well as Git, GitHub and TailwindCSS.
aboutMe.paragraph-mid: Proactive, communicative and adaptable, I value teamwork and the search for creative solutions. My mission is to transform ideas into technological projects that deliver impact and quality.
aboutMe.paragraph-bottom: I am always learning and evolving to create efficient and innovative digital experiences.

projects.subtitle: Projects
projects.title: My Projects
projects.description-MaqSoft: Institutional and functional website for the Maq Soft ice cream shop, with an attractive home page and integrated shopping cart to facilitate online orders.
projects.description-Portfolio: Portfolio with front-end projects developed with a focus on responsive design, usability and solutions that generate real results for clients and companies.
projects.description-ToDoList: Functional To-Do List developed with React and styled with Styled-Components, allowing efficient organization of tasks with an intuitive and modern interface.
projects.description-DolcciB: Dolcci'B confectionery website with a delicate look, complete menu and shopping cart system for quick, intuitive and personalized online orders.
projects.description-MarcasDoAndre: Portfolio developed for a designer, with a minimalist and functional layout, focused on presenting and selling your work with elegance and usability.
projects.description-Conversor: Currency converter integrated with an API, allowing you to convert values in reais to different currencies in a practical, accurate and real-time way.
projects.description-DevNews: Dev News is a blog of articles for devs, made with React and public API. It has filters by tags and keyword searches, focusing on data consumption and practice with Axios.
projects.description-DevMovies: DevFlix is a responsive project developed with ReactJS that simulates a streaming platform, presenting dynamic listings of movies and series.
projects.description-MyWallet: My Wallet, a Front-End application developed with the aim of providing a practical and intuitive solution for controlling personal finances.

experience.subtitle: Experience
experience.title: My Trajectory
experience.2023-paragraph: I discovered programming and fell in love with creating interfaces that generate value and unique experiences.
experience.2024-paragraph: I create modern, responsive interfaces focused on user experience. I work on projects for companies and individuals, always aiming to add real value to their results through efficient digital solutions.

form.title: Get in touch
form.description-top: I am available to talk about projects, ideas or partnerships.
form.description-bottom: Please fill out the form below and I will get back to you as soon as possible.
